CustomField.formula:
IF( Deductible_Amount__c >0 && !ISBLANK(Deductible_Amount__c ) && Deductible_Percentage__c =0,'$' & TEXT(FLOOR(Deductible_Amount__c /1000)) & ',' & RIGHT(TEXT(Deductible_Amount__c ), LEN(TEXT(Deductible_Amount__c )) - LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Deductible_Amount__c /1000)))),
IF(Deductible_Amount__c >0 && !ISBLANK(Deductible_Percentage__c)&&Deductible_Percentage__c>0 ,Text(FLOOR(Deductible_Percentage__c*100))&"%"&" or "&"$"
& TEXT(FLOOR(Deductible_Amount__c /1000)) & ',' & RIGHT(TEXT(Deductible_Amount__c ), LEN(TEXT(Deductible_Amount__c )) - LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Deductible_Amount__c /1000)))),
IF( !ISBLANK(Deductible_Percentage__c) && Deductible_Percentage__c >0 , TEXT(FLOOR(Deductible_Percentage__c*100)) & "%",
IF(Deductible_Days__c >0 && !Isnull(Deductible_Days__c) , TEXT(Deductible_Days__c)&" Days ",""))))
CustomField.label: whatToShow
